nano_d_line_wrap_e.message: Soft wrap long lines in filter editor
nano_d_line_wrap_e.description: English: Soft wrap long lines in filter editor

nano_d_line_wrap_v.message: Soft wrap long lines in filter viewer
nano_d_line_wrap_v.description: English: Soft wrap long lines in filter viewer

nano_d_recompile_filters.description: Button in advanced settings to recompile filters

nano_d_resources_links.message: Nano viene con dos conjuntos de recursos, los Recursos de uBlock Origin y los Recursos Extra de Nano.
nano_d_resources_links.description: Resources reference links, 'Resources' and 'Extra Resources' should be translated

nano_d_ace_help.message: El Editor de Filtros de Nano está potenciado por Ace y la mayoría de los atajos de teclado funcionan igual.
nano_d_ace_help.description: [Not Used] Explain the similarity between Nano Filter Editor and Ace in terms of shortcut keys

nano_v_read_error.message: No se puede cargar el contenido. Por favor, actualice la pestaña.
nano_v_read_error.description: Message when filter content could not be loaded

nano_p_cache_control.description: The cache control strip name, can be at most 20 English characters wide

nano_p_open_firewall_pane.message: Alternar el panel de vista general
nano_p_open_firewall_pane.description: Tooltip for toggle firewall details (sometimes called overview panel) button

nano_p_refresh_button.message:
Haz clic aquí para actualizar esta página.

Ctrl+clic para actualizar esta página sin usar memoria caché.
nano_p_refresh_button.description:
English: Click to refresh this page.

Ctrl+click to refresh this page while bypassing cache.

nano_p_force_scroll.message: (beta) Enter force scroll mode (will break layout)

nano_p_bug_reporter.message: (beta) Abrir la ficha de reporte de fallos

nano_l_whitelist_aborted_w.message: Nano did not scan the rest of the whitelists for warnings because there are too many warnings.
nano_l_whitelist_aborted_w.description: Warning when too many warnings in whitelists

nano_l_whitelist_suspecious_re.message: Esta línea es tratada como una expresión regular. ¿Está puesto a propósito?
nano_l_whitelist_suspecious_re.description: Warning when parsed as regular expression but is unlikely the intention of user

nano_l_whitelist_aborted_e.message: Nano did not scan the rest of the whitelists for errors because there are too many errors.
nano_l_whitelist_aborted_e.description: Error when too many errors in whitelists

nano_l_whitelist_invalid_hostname.message: Este nombre de host no es válido.

nano_l_whitelist_invalid_re.message: Esta expresión regular tiene errores de sintaxis.
nano_l_whitelist_invalid_re.description: Error when regular expression has syntax errors

nano_l_whitelist_invalid_url.description: Error when a URL not valid

nano_l_filter_aborted_w.message: Nano did not scan the rest of the filter rules for warnings because there are too many warnings.
nano_l_filter_aborted_w.description: Warning when too many warnings in filter rules

nano_l_filter_script_snippet_double_exce.message: Nano descartó un dominio negado porque no se puede usar en una regla de excepción dentro de un fragmento de script.
nano_l_filter_script_snippet_double_exce.description: Warning when negated domain used with script snippet exception

nano_l_filter_converted_to_exception.message: Nano convirtió esta regla en una excepción porque solo contiene dominios negados.
nano_l_filter_converted_to_exception.description: Warning when a rule is convered to exception because all negated domains

nano_l_filter_negated_html_filtering.message: Los dominios negados aún no son admitidos por el filtrado de HTML.
nano_l_filter_negated_html_filtering.description: Warning when negated domains used with HTML filtering

nano_l_filter_discarded_non_negatable_ty.message: Nano descartó la opción de tipo {{type}} porque no puede ser negado.
nano_l_filter_discarded_non_negatable_ty.description: [Not Used] English: Nano discarded the type option '{{type}}' because it cannot be negated.

nano_l_filter_unsupported_type_ignored.message: Nano descartó las opciones de tipo que aún no son admitidas.
nano_l_filter_unsupported_type_ignored.description: Warning when unsupported types discarded but not entire rule

nano_l_filter_resource_not_found.message: El recurso '{{res}}' no puede ser encontrado. ¿Está escrito correctamente?

nano_l_filter_resource_not_redirectable.message: El recurso '{{res}}' no se puede usar como un objetivo de redirección.

nano_l_filter_resource_not_injectable.message: El recurso '{{res}}' no se puede inyectar como un fragmento de script.

nano_l_filter_resource_alias_used.message: '{{alias}}' es el alias de '{{res}}', considera usar el nombre real en su lugar.

nano_l_html_filtering_not_supported.message: El filtrado de HTML no es admitido por tu navegador.
nano_l_html_filtering_not_supported.description: Warning when HTML filtering is used on unsupported platforms

nano_l_filter_comment_bracket.message: El uso de '[' para denotar un comentario está obsoleto. Usa '!' en su lugar.

nano_l_filter_inline_comment.message: Los comentarios en una línea están obsoletos.

nano_l_filter_script_contains.message: '##script:contains(...)' está obsoleto. Usa '##^script:has-text(...)' en su lugar.

nano_l_filter_mp4_option.message: El uso de la opción 'mp4' está obsoleto. Escribe las opciones completas en su lugar.

nano_l_filter_aborted_e.message: Nano did not scan the rest of the filter rules for errors because there are too many errors.
nano_l_filter_aborted_e.description: Error when too many errors in filter rules

nano_l_filter_ag_js_injection.message: Raw JavaScript injection is not allowed due to security concerns.

nano_l_filter_bad_selector.message: El selector en esta regla tiene errores de sintaxis.
nano_l_filter_bad_selector.description: Error when selector has syntax errors

nano_l_filter_too_expensive.message: Esta regla no puede ser genérica.
nano_l_filter_too_expensive.description: Error when expensive rule is generic

nano_l_filter_style_injection_syntax_err.message: Esta regla de inyección de CSS tiene errores de sintaxis.
nano_l_filter_style_injection_syntax_err.description: Error when CSS injection has syntax errors

nano_l_filter_assets_access_violation.message: Los filtros no privilegiados no pueden hacer referencia a recursos privilegiados.
nano_l_filter_assets_access_violation.description: Error when unprivileged filter references a privileged resources

nano_l_filter_localhost_entry.message: Esta entrada de archivo de host está descartada porque es una declaración a este equipo.

nano_l_filter_ag_element_remove.message: Las reglas de remoción de elementos con la sintaxis de AdGuard aún no son admitidas. Use '##^' en su lugar.
nano_l_filter_ag_element_remove.description: Error when AdGuard style element remove rule

nano_l_filter_negated_generichide.message: Las opciones 'generichide', 'ghide', y 'elemhide' no pueden ser negadas.

nano_l_filter_bad_csp_option_arguments.message: La opción 'csp=...' no tiene argumentos o tiene argumentos inválidos.
nano_l_filter_bad_csp_option_arguments.description: Error when 'csp=' has no arguments or has invalid arguments

nano_l_filter_unknown_option.description: English: The option '{{option}}' is not recognized.

nano_l_filter_only_unsupported_type.message: Esta regla de filtrado seleccionó solo opciones de tipo aún no admitidas.
nano_l_filter_only_unsupported_type.description: Error when filter rule selected only unsupported types

nano_l_filter_no_type.message: Esta regla de filtrado explícitamente no seleccionó ninguna opción de tipo.
nano_l_filter_no_type.description: Error when filter rule explicitly selected no types

nano_l_filter_bad_re.message: Esta regla de red tiene errores de sintaxis de expresión regular.
nano_l_filter_bad_re.description: Error when network rule has regular expression syntax errors

nano_l_filter_too_short.message: Esta regla de red es demasiado corta.
nano_l_filter_too_short.description: Error when network rule is too short

nano_l_filter_matcher_too_long.message: La coincidencia de esta regla de red es demasiado larga.
nano_l_filter_matcher_too_long.description: Error when network matcher is too long

nano_l_filter_generic_js_in_block.message: La sintaxis de inyección de script que selecciona todos los recursos solo se puede usar en filtros de excepción.

nano_l_filter_intervention_smed79.message: El ancla de dominio no puede ser seguido inmediatamente por un '^'.
nano_l_filter_intervention_smed79.description: Error when the bad rule from SMed79 is discarded

nano_r_no_type.message: Nano discarded the redirect portion of this rule because it must select a type option.
nano_r_no_type.description: Warning when redirect selected no types

nano_r_too_many_types.message: Nano discarded the redirect portion of this rule because it selected too many type options.
nano_r_too_many_types.description: Warning when redirect selected too many types

nano_r_no_resource_token.message: Nano discarded the redirect portion of this rule because it has no arguments.
nano_r_no_resource_token.description: Warning when redirect has no arguments

nano_r_no_supported_type.message: Nano discarded the redirect portion of this rule because it did not select any supported type options.
nano_r_no_supported_type.description: Warning when redirect selected no supported type

nano_r_negated_domain.message: Nano discarded part of the redirect portion of this rule because negated domains cannot be used with redirect.
nano_r_negated_domain.description: Warning when negated domain used with redirect

nano_r_no_destination.message: Nano discarded the redirect portion of this rule because it has no valid destination domain.
nano_r_no_destination.description: Warning when redirect has no destination

nano_r_does_not_match_re.message: Nano discarded the redirect portion of this rule because this network rule does not match this regular expression: {{regexp}}
nano_r_does_not_match_re.description: Warning when redirect failed initial test, use '{{regexp}}' to denote the tester if needed

nano_r_simplified_to_star.message: Nano simplificó la coincidencia de esta regla a '*'.
nano_r_simplified_to_star.description: Warning when the '*/*' workaround is simplified

nano_r_redirect_in_exception.message: Las reglas de redirección no pueden ser excepciones.
nano_r_redirect_in_exception.description: Error when redirect used in exception

nano_r_redirected_twice.message: Las reglas de redirección solo pueden contener una directiva de redirección.
nano_r_redirected_twice.description: Error when two redirects in one rule

nano_b_cosmetic_filter_passed_through.message: Esta regla es rechazada por ahora. Más información: https://github.com/NanoAdblocker/NanoCore/issues/77
